programme.title: Live: WWE Friday Night SmackDown
programme.desc: The Superstars of World Wrestling Entertainment display their skills and athleticism in weekly episodic programming, as scores are settled and enduring rivalries play out in the ring.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: Rudy and Deck have a tense encounter with a witness and make a crucial discovery about their client.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: A look inside Episode 2 of USA's The Rainmaker.

The first responders race to help a homeless man crushed in a garbage truck, a mother and son in a crashed elevator, and extreme hoarders trapped in their house; Athena starts dating; the situation with Abby's mother tests her relationship with Buck.

The first responders take calls involving an unusual domestic disturbance, a "death" at a psychic's place, and a motorcycle crash; Bobby dips his toes into the dating pool; Abby walks down memory lane, and Buck is confronted by his past actions.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: Rudy and Deck have a tense encounter with a witness and make a crucial discovery about their client.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: After shedding hundreds of pounds, a popular kindergarten teacher goes missing; investigators find a link between her weight loss and her disappearance.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: When Bonnie Craig was found dead, police collected DNA, but it didn't match anyone in the system; 12 years later there is a hit, but the man is thousands of miles away and, as it turns out, prosecutors need more than DNA to convict a killer.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: As a murder victim's sisters dedicate themselves to finding the killer, an unexpected source turns the case upside down.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: As a murder victim's sisters dedicate themselves to finding the killer, an unexpected source turns the case upside down.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Firehouse 51 responds to a massive freeway accident that impacts someone close to them; Foster runs into someone from her past after a harrowing call; Casey and Naomi grow closer; Severide and Kidd's relationship is tested.

programme.desc: Stateside Premier League fan festival that includes a turf pitch, the Premier League trophy, club mascots, special guests, contests, and more.

programme.desc: Stateside Premier League fan festival that includes a turf pitch, the Premier League trophy, club mascots, special guests, contests, and more.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: Rudy and Deck have a tense encounter with a witness and make a crucial discovery about their client.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Tiny fibers and an asthma inhaler are the clues that lead officers to the killer of an off-duty policeman.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey and Naomi fight to escape a raging fire in Casey's apartment; Brett and the team struggle to create an engaging community fire safety presentation; Severide and Kidd's relationship reaches a crossroads.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey further investigates a motorcycle accident at the request of the victim's son; Kidd, Foster and Brett bond while helping Kidd fix a mistake; Mouch and Otis have a falling out after Otis' teasing hits a sore spot.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Cruz leads the charge in getting the firehouse to gear up for the Polar Plunge; Herrmann has a hard time bouncing back after dealing with a tough call; Foster's personal relationships begin to interfere with her job.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Brett, Foster and Kidd take a road trip to Indiana and encounter an accident involving a boys' hockey team that leaves them scrambling and relying on their instincts to save the injured; the rest of Firehouse 51 competes in the annual chili cook-off.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A spate of robberies comes to light after a firehouse lockbox key goes missing; Sgt. Hank Voight suspects a firefighter may be involved, and with Boden's support, he recruits Cruz to go under cover to help sniff out any suspicious activity.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Casey struggles after experiencing a narrow miss on a call; Otis wins a unique sporting opportunity in a raffle; Grissom turns to Severide for assistance when the mayor's office sends a task force to Firehouse 51.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Tensions run high between Casey and Herrmann after the firehouse responds to an apartment complex fire; after discovering something extremely suspicious during the call, Kidd and Severide do some investigating and get CPD on the case.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide gets angry at Cruz when he feels his orders were disobeyed in the field; Boden reconnects with an old high school friend during a call to a house fire. Herrmann has issues when one of his favorite knick-knacks from Molly's goes missing.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A horrible storm wreaks havoc on Chicago and impacts Firehouse 51 when the power goes off; when a little boy mysteriously shows up at the station, everyone works together to uncover who he belongs to; Foster and Kidd argue about Severide.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide and Boden search to uncover whether arson was the cause of a fire at a hair salon; Mouch, Herrmann, Otis and Kidd make a startling discovery while tracking down the missing piercing nozzle from Engine 27.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A serial arsonist cold case is reopened when Lt. Severide finds a connection to a recent salon fire; Firehouse 51 celebrates a retirement party.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide and Kidd continue to investigate Benny's old arson case; unexpected news leads Brett to ponder a big decision; all hell breaks loose.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman with a seemingly squeaky-clean image is found dead in a fountain; further investigation reveals a surprising motive and multiple suspects.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a janitor violently attacks a coach, the SVU team connects the janitor's behavior to a history of sexual abuse; the detectives find more victims of the same predator -- including a prisoner (Mike Tyson) on death row.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As the SVU detectives investigate the alleged rape of a sorority pledge, drunken students and conflicting accounts complicate matters.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When two sniper attacks on the NYPD link to Detective Tutuola's past as a narcotics officer, he reconnects with his former partner in hope of finding a motive; Lt. Alexandra Eames helps SVU investigate.
